japan_name: 聖子 黒髪姫 空星内親王

background.origin: simple village girl from Central Java

family.grandmother: lives alone in Kota Derana, East Java

background.life_decision: After graduating elementary school, moved to Kota Derana to live with grandmother and attend junior high school there, since neither parents nor grandmother could relocate.

origin_event.description: While walking through rice fields alone at midnight, witnessed a very bright meteor falling nearby. After intense white light, suddenly gained the ability to fly at high speed. No clear memory of exact moment of acquisition.

background.post_power_life: Frequently travels around the world in minutes using flight ability. Developed strong interest in photography using smartphone to capture global journeys.
background.power_summary: Superhuman flight at very high speed (able to travel between countries in minutes)
